prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
The shirt I ordered arrived with a stain, and customer service was no help at all. 

I waited over an hour for my meal at the restaurant, only to find it was cold when it finally arrived.

The app crashes every time I try to log in. This is beyond frustrating.

I was promised a two-day shipping, but my package took over a week to arrive. 

The staff at the hotel were unhelpful and seemed uninterested in assisting us with our issues.

I can't believe how misleading the advertisement was; the product looks nothing like what was shown online.

The coffee I ordered was burnt, and the barista didn't seem to care when I mentioned it.

I signed up for a subscription and was charged twice in one month without warning. Very disappointing.

The website is so confusing, I couldn't find where to check out my cart.

I asked for a gluten-free option at dinner, and the waiter seemed annoyed by my request.

The travel agency promised a great deal, but it turned out to be more expensive than booking directly.

I returned the item a month ago, and I'm still waiting for my refund. This is unacceptable.

The customer support representative spoke over me and didn’t address my concerns at all.

The gym was overcrowded, and several machines were out of order during my visit.

I expected better quality for the price I paid; the shoes fell apart after just a week.

The online chat feature is useless; I got automated responses that didn't help my problem.

I had a terrible experience with the airline; my flight was delayed twice with no explanation.

The furniture I ordered was damaged upon arrival, and the replacement process is taking forever.

I thought the spa would be relaxing, but the staff were loud and disruptive during my treatment.

The movie I rented was scratched and unwatchable. This is the last time I use this service.

I received the wrong size in my order, and now I have to go through the hassle of returning it.

The food was bland and overpriced; I won’t be returning to that restaurant again.

The app is slow and crashes frequently, making it impossible to use effectively.

I was treated rudely by the cashier, which left a bad taste in my mouth about the whole experience.

The tour guide was disorganized and seemed to lack knowledge about the sights we visited.

I expected better service from a supposedly high-end restaurant, but the staff was inattentive.

The hotel room was not cleaned properly, and I found hair in the bathroom.

I’m frustrated that the promotional discount didn’t apply at checkout, even though I followed all the steps.

The packaging was damaged when it arrived, and the product inside was broken.

The concert I attended was poorly organized, and we missed half of the opening act.

I was charged for a service I never received, and customer support hasn't resolved the issue.

I found the experience to be very impersonal; the staff didn’t make an effort to engage with customers.

The product I bought was advertised as “high-quality,” but it feels cheap and flimsy.

I had to wait on hold for over 30 minutes just to ask a simple question.

The merchandise was not as described; it looked much better in the pictures.

I was disappointed with the lack of options on the menu; nothing appealed to me.

The app is riddled with bugs, making it a frustrating experience every time I use it.

I booked a family package, but the amenities promised were not available upon arrival.

The delivery was late, and I had to contact customer service multiple times to find out where it was.

I felt like I was ignored by the staff during my entire visit; it was very off-putting.

The product didn’t work as advertised, and I wasted my money on it.

The ambiance was nice, but the service was dreadfully slow, ruining our evening out.

The subscription service was supposed to be convenient, but it has been nothing but hassle.

The tour was overpriced, and we didn’t get to see half of what was promised in the itinerary.

I received a faulty product and the return process was a nightmare; very disappointing.

The website gave me false information about the availability of the item.

I was shocked by the lack of professionalism from the staff during my appointment.

The food took forever to arrive, and when it did, it was not what I ordered.

I was expecting a luxury experience, but the hotel felt more like a budget motel.

My last order was missing an item, and I can’t get anyone to respond to my inquiry.
